div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 262 Diakofto, on the coast c. 20 km. E of Aegium, Achaea, 1965 Burial: c. 146 B.C. (T) Contents: 3000+ AR Lamia: 1 triob. Aetolian League: 63 triob. Locri Opuntii: 12 triob. Phocis: 4 triob. Boeotia: 28 triob. Thebes: 7 triob. Chalcis: 92 dr. Histiaea: 6 tetrob. Sicyon: 459 triob. (29 early, 430 late) CNG Coin Shop 775210 CNG Coin Shop 832025 CNG Coin Shop 831994 Aegae: 1 triob. Achaean League: 1601 triob. CNG Coin Shop 775269 Messene: 6 triob. CNG Coin Shop 790011 CNG Coin Shop 877551 Corone: 2 triob. Argos: 391 triob. (22 early, 369 late) Megalopolis: 226 triob. Roman Rep.: 1 quinarius (Syd. 609a = 83/2 B.C.; intrusion?) Disposition: in commerce Information from M. Price; details of above on file in BM
